headline: Assessing Dow (DOW) Valuation After Recent Share Price Rebound And Conflicting Fair Value Signals
summary: Dow (DOW) has delivered mixed recent returns, with the share price up 2.6% over the past day, around 8.4% over the past month and roughly 10.2% over the past 3 months, while the 1 year total return remains negative. See our latest analysis for Dow. With the latest share price at $24.90, Dow’s recent momentum has been positive, with a 30 day share price return of 8.45% contrasting with a 1 year total shareholder return decline of 32.09%. This suggests sentiment has improved in the short term...
